name: N-GON
description:
N-GON is a vertical scroll shooter where you constantly face waves and waves of enemies. Dodge their attacks and fight them off. Kill them fast enough to get extra points.

MAGNET:

Drop your bullet magnet to turn your enemies into big explosion chains. Some enemies a protected from direct attacks and need an indirect approach.

DIFFICULTY:

It starts slow, but soon it becomes impossible*.

SCORING SYSTEM:
Leaderboards are accessible for everyone. Start from any level all the way up to ENDLESS MODE, get the most out of score multipliers, become the best.

MISSIONS:
An integrated achievement system to track your progress across different tasks at hand.

UNLOCKABLES:
18 cosmetic cores, and 8 palettes. Unlockable alternative inverted color mode and a harder fast game mode.

FEATURES:
  • 50 pre-designed levels
  • 19 different enemy types, making for a lot of variety in terms of enemy combinations
  • special boss waves, where you face deadlier versions of enemies
  • ENDLESS MODE, a true challenge
  • Unique eye-melting art style

------------------------------------
* it's not actually impossible
